RuleSet.Name: src/Schema/jpa/SchemaTableHPKey.java
RuleSet.Descr: Java JPA implementation of a $TableName$ history primary key object.

GenFile.Name: fileSchemaTableHPKeyJPAJava
GenFile.BasePackageName: $reference ManufacturingSchema lower JavaPackage$.$reference ManufacturingSchema lower SchemaName$/src/main/java
GenFile.SubPackageName: $reference ManufacturingSchema lower JavaPackage$.$reference ManufacturingSchema lower SchemaName$.jpa

RuleSet.GenRule: implements Comparable<Object>, Serializable
, Comparable<$SchemaName$$TableName$H>$switch HasSuperClassRelation yes empty default implHPKeyImplementsComparableHPKey$
, Comparable<$reference BaseClass SchemaName$$reference BaseClass TableName$HPKey>
, $reference BaseClass SchemaName$$reference BaseClass TableName$HPKey, $SchemaName$$TableName$H
